Upgrades.Description: You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you execute a maneuver, if you did not overlap a ship or obstacle and there are no enemy ships inside your firing arc at Range 1-3, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.
Upgrades.Name: Flight-Assist Astromech

Upgrades.Description: You may treat all 1- and 2-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.
Upgrades.Name: R2 Astromech

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the elite upgrade icon. You cannot equip this upgrade if you already have an elite upgrade icon or if your pilot skill value is "2" or lower.
Upgrades.Name: R2-D6

Upgrades.Description: When you declare the target of your attack, if the defender is inside your firing arc, you may receive 1 stress token to cause the defender to receive 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: R3-A2

Upgrades.Description: When you are hit by an attack and there are at least 3 uncancelled ^HIT results, you may choose and cancel those results until there are 2 remaining. For each result cancelled in this way, receive 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: R4-D6

Upgrades.Description: During the End phase, you may choose 1 of your faceup Damage cards with the Ship trait and flip it facedown.
Upgrades.Name: R5 Astromech

Upgrades.Description: Before you reveal your maneuver, you may discard this card to ignore obstacles until the end of the round.
Upgrades.Name: R5-X3

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal a green maneuver, you may perform a free ^BARRELROLL action.
Upgrades.Name: BB-8

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, when attacking with a primary weapon, you may cancel 1 of your ^FOCUS results during the "Modify Attack Dice" step to assign 1 ^EVADE token to your ship.
Upgrades.Name: R3 Astromech

Upgrades.Description: After spending your target lock, roll 1 defense die. On an ^EVADE result, immediately acquire a target lock on that same ship. You cannot spend this target lock during this attack.
Upgrades.Name: R5-K6

Upgrades.Description: Once per round when defending, if you have a target lock on the attacker, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all attack dice. The attacker must reroll the chosen dice.
Upgrades.Name: R7 Astromech

Upgrades.Description: After you execute a red maneuver, you may acquire a target lock.
Upgrades.Name: Targeting Astromech

Upgrades.Description: When a ship you have locked is attacking, you may choose 1 attack die. The attacker must reroll that die. You can acquire target locks on other friendly ships.
Upgrades.Name: M9-G8

Upgrades.Description: ACTION: Increase your agility value by 1 until the end of this game round.
Upgrades.Name: R2-F2

Upgrades.Description: Action:  Roll 1 defense die. On an ^EVADE or ^FOCUS result, discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards.
Upgrades.Name: R5-D8

Upgrades.Description: At the end of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 of your focus tokens to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).
Upgrades.Name: R5-P9

Upgrades.Description: ACTION: Choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2. If you are inside that ship's firing arc, you may acquire a target lock on that ship. Then, you may perform a free ^BOOST action.
Upgrades.Name: R7-T1

Upgrades.Description: After executing a green maneuver, you may recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).
Upgrades.Name: R2-D2

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 ion bomb token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase. When thisbomb token detonates, each ship at Range 1 of the token receives 2 ion tokens. Then discard this token.
Upgrades.Name: Ion Bombs

Upgrades.Description: When you equip this card, place 3 ordnance tokens on each other equipped ^BOMB Upgrade card. When you are instructed to discard an Upgrade card, you may discard 1 ordnance token on that card instead.
Upgrades.Name: Ordnance Silos

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 seismic charge token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase. When the bomb detonates, each ship at range 1 of this token suffers 1 damage. Then discard this token.
Upgrades.Name: Seismic Charges

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal your maneuver, you may drop 1 bomblet token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.
Upgrades.Name: Bomblet Generator

Upgrades.Description: Action: Discard this card to drop 1 proximity mine token. When a ship executes a maneuver, if its base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token detonates. When the bomb token detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token rolls 3 attack dice and suffers all damage ^HIT and critical damage ^CRITICAL rolled. Then discard this token.
Upgrades.Name: Proximity Mines

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal your manoeuvre dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 thermal detonator token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase. When this bomb token detonates, each ship at Range 1 of the token suffers 1 damage and receives 1 stress token. Then discard this token.
Upgrades.Name: Thermal Detonators

Upgrades.Description: Action: Discard this card to drop 1 cluster mine token set. When a ship's base or manoeuvre template overlaps a cluster mine token, that token detonates. When one of these bomb tokens detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped that token rolls 2 attack dice and suffers all damage (^HIT) rolled. Then discard that token.
Upgrades.Name: Cluster Mines

Upgrades.Description: Action: Discard this card to drop 1 Conner net token. When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token detonates. When this bomb token detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token suffers 1 damage, receives 2 ion tokens, and skips its "Perform Action" step. Then discard this token.
Upgrades.Name: Conner Net

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 proton bomb token. The bomb detonates at the end of the Activation phase. When the bomb token detonates, deal 1 faceup damage card to each ship at Range 1 of this token. Then discard this token.
Upgrades.Name: Proton Bomb

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, assign the defender 1 jam token. Then cancel all dice results.
Upgrades.Name: Jamming Beam

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, the defender receives 1 tractor beam token. Then cancel all dice results. Range: 1-3. Attack value: 3.
Upgrades.Name: Tractor Beam

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, you must choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender to suffer 1 damage. Then flip this card. Attack value: 4. Range: 1.
Upgrades.Name: Arc Caster

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may receive a weapons disabled token to flip this card.
Upgrades.Name: ARC Caster (Recharging)

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and, if the defender is not stressed, it also receives 1 stress token. Then cancel all dice results. Range: 1-3. Attack value: 3.
Upgrades.Name: Flechette Cannon

Upgrades.Description: When attacking with a primary weapon or ^Cannon seconday weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.
Upgrades.Name: Linked Battery

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits the target ship, the ship suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results. Attack value: 3. Range: 1-3.
Upgrades.Name: Ion Cannon

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. When attacking, you may change 1 of your ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL result. Range: 1-3. Attack value: 3.
Upgrades.Name: “Mangler” Cannon

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. Your ^HIT results cannot be cancelled by defense dice. The defender may cancel ^CRITICAL results before ^HIT results. Attack value: 3. Range 1.
Upgrades.Name: Autoblaster

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. Immediately after rolling your attack dice, you must change all your Critical results to Hit results. Attack value: 4. Range: 2-3.
Upgrades.Name: Heavy Laser Cannon

Upgrades.Description: You may dock up to 4 TIE fighters, TIE Interceptors, TIE bombers, or TIE Advanced to this ship. All of these ships must have the same ship type.
Upgrades.Name: Docking Clamps

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, when you would be dealt a faceup Damage card, you may draw that card from either the fore or aft Damage deck.
Upgrades.Name: Expanded Cargo Hold

Upgrades.Description: Your action bar gains the ^Jam action icon.
Upgrades.Name: Broadcast Array

Upgrades.Description: At the end of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to place 1 container token.
Upgrades.Name: Quick-release Cargo Locks

Upgrades.Description: At the end of each round, you may spend 1 energy to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).
Upgrades.Name: Backup Shield Generator

Upgrades.Description: When you obstruct an attack, the defender rolls 3 additional defense dice (instead of 1).
Upgrades.Name: EM Emitter

Upgrades.Description: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver dial, you may spend 1 energy to execute a white ( ^Straight 1) maneuver.  You cannot use this ability if you would overlap another ship.
Upgrades.Name: Engine Booster

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, you may discard this card to roll 2 additional attack dice.
Upgrades.Name: Supercharged Power Cells

Upgrades.Description: After defending, you may discard this card. If you do, each other ship at Range 1 of the defending section rolls 2 attack dice, suffering all damage (^Hit) and critical damage (^Critical) rolled.
Upgrades.Name: Cluster Bombs

Upgrades.Description: Energy: Spend 1 energy to remove all stress tokens from a friendly ship at Range 1-3. Then assign 1 focus token to that ship.
Upgrades.Name: Comms Booster

Upgrades.Description: When you perform a jam action, choose 1 enemy ship that does not have a stress token and is at Range 1 of the jammed ship. The chosen ship receives 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Frequency Jammer

Upgrades.Description: Energy: Spend 5 energy from this card and discard this card to cause each other ship at Range 1 to suffer 1 damage and receive 1 ion token.
Upgrades.Name: Ionization Reactor

Upgrades.Description: When an enemy ship is declaring either a small or large ship as the target of its attack, you may spend 3 energy to force that ship to target you if possible.
Upgrades.Name: Shield Projector

Upgrades.Description: Energy: You may discard this card to gain 3 energy.
Upgrades.Name: Tibanna Gas Supplies

Upgrades.Description: Action: Choose 1 or more ships at Range 1-3 that have a stress token.  For each ship chosen, you may spend 1 energy to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.
Upgrades.Name: Slicer Tools

Upgrades.Description: You may perform actions while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1 damage.
Upgrades.Name: "Chopper"

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the End phase, you may discard this card to replace a faceup ^Illicit or ^Cargo Upgrade card you have equipped with another Upgrade card of the same type of equal or fewer squad points.
Upgrades.Name: Cikatro Vizago

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the "Place Forces" step, you may choose to treat your pilot skill value as "0" or "8" until the end of the step.
Upgrades.Name: Courier Droid

Upgrades.Description: Enemy ships inside your firing arc that you are touching are not considered to be touching you when either you or they activate during the Combat phase.
Upgrades.Name: "Zeb" Orrelios

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, during the "Modify Attack Dice" step, you may receive 1 ion token to choose 1 of the defender's focus or evade tokens. That token cannot be spent during this attack.
Upgrades.Name: 4-LOM

Upgrades.Description: After performing an attack, if the defender was dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard this card to choose and discard 1 of the defender's Upgrade cards.
Upgrades.Name: Boba Fett

Upgrades.Description: When you acquire a target lock, you can lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-3 of any friendly ship.
Upgrades.Name: Bodhi Rook

Upgrades.Description: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [2] ^STRAIGHT template instead of the [1] ^STRAIGHT template.
Upgrades.Name: Bombardier

Upgrades.Description: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may spend 1 reinforce token to flip it facedown (without resolving its effect). If you do, until the end of the round, when you are dealt a faceup Damage card, flip it facedown (without resolving its effect).
Upgrades.Name: Breach Specialist

Upgrades.Description: The first time you attack each round and the first time you defend each round, the first Damage card dealt is dealt faceup.
Upgrades.Name: Greedo

Upgrades.Description: You can reveal and execute red manoeuvres even while stressed.
Upgrades.Name: Hera Syndulla

Upgrades.Description: You have the pilot ability of each friendly ship with the IG-2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).
Upgrades.Name: IG-88D

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-2 removes a stress token, it may remove 1 additional stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Inspiring Recruit

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range: 1-2. You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver.
Upgrades.Name: Intelligence Agent

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the End phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-2. That ship does not remove its tractor beam tokens.
Upgrades.Name: Ketsu Onyo

Upgrades.Description: You may treat all ^STRAIGHT maneuvers as green maneuvers.
Upgrades.Name: Nien Nunb

Upgrades.Description: When you preform a recover action, instead of spending all your energy, you can choose any amount of energy to spend.
Upgrades.Name: Shield Technician

Upgrades.Description: When you preform a recover action, instead of spending all your energy, you can choose any amount of energy to spend.
Upgrades.Name: Shield Technician

Upgrades.Description: After executing a maneuver that causes you to overlap an enemy ship, you may suffer 1 damage to perform 1 free action.
Upgrades.Name: Unkar Plutt

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, you may reroll your ^FOCUS results.
Upgrades.Name: Wookiee Commandos

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may receive any number of stress tokens to choose an equal number of defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.
Upgrades.Name: Zuckuss

Upgrades.Description: Action: Place 1 shield token on this card. Action: Remove 1 shield token from this card to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).
Upgrades.Name: "Gonk"

Upgrades.Description: Action: Perform a free boost action. Then receive 1 ion token.
Upgrades.Name: "Leebo"

Upgrades.Description: Energy: You may remove up to 3 shields from your ship. For each shield removed, gain 1 energy.
Upgrades.Name: Admiral Ozzel

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the first round, choose 1 enemy small or large ship. When attacking or defending agaist that ship, you may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^HIT or ^EVADE result.
Upgrades.Name: Agent Callus

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the first round, choose 1 enemy small or large ship. When attacking or defending against that ship, you may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^Hit or ^EVADE result.
Upgrades.Name: Agent Kallus

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the End phase, you may spend 1 energy to replace a faceup ^Crew or ^TEAM Upgrade card you have equipped with another Upgrade card of the same type of equal or fewer squad points.
Upgrades.Name: Azmorigan

Upgrades.Description: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL result.
Upgrades.Name: Bistan

Upgrades.Description: When a ship you are touching activates, you may look at its chosen maneuver. If you do, its owner must rotate the dial to an adjacent maneuver. The ship can reveal and execute that maneuver even while stressed.
Upgrades.Name: BoShek

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, if you are not stressed, you must receive 1 stress token. Then assign 1 focus token to your ship and acquire a target lock on the defender.
Upgrades.Name: Bossk

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^BOMB upgrade icon. Once per round, when an enemy ship rolls attack dice due to a friendly bomb detonating, you may choose any number of ^FOCUS and blank results. It must reroll those results.
Upgrades.Name: Cad Bane

Upgrades.Description: If you overlap an obstacle during the Activation phase, do not suffer 1 faceup damage card. Instead, roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT or ^CRITICAL result, suffer 1 damage.
Upgrades.Name: Captain Needa

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Captain Rex

Upgrades.Description: At the end of the Planning phase, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2. Guess aloud that ship's bearing and speed, then look at its dial. If you are correct, you may rotate your dial to another manoeuvre.
Upgrades.Name: Cassian Andor

Upgrades.Description: You may perform attacks while overlapping an obstacle. Your attacks cannot be obstructed.
Upgrades.Name: Dash Rendar

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend that target lock to change all your ^FOCUS results to ^HIT results.
Upgrades.Name: Han Solo

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range: 1-3 performs a focus action or would be assigned a focus token, you may assign an evade token instead.
Upgrades.Name: Jan Ors

Upgrades.Description: Action: Choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Assign 1 focus token to that ship for each enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3. You cannot assign more than 3 tokens this way.
Upgrades.Name: Jyn Erso

Upgrades.Description: When defending, you may remove 1 stress token from the attacker to add 1 ^EVADE result to your roll.
Upgrades.Name: Latts Razzi

Upgrades.Description: When attacking at Range 3, you may change one of your ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL result.
Upgrades.Name: Mercenary Copilot

Upgrades.Description: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard this upgrade card or another ^CREW upgrade card to flip that Damage card facedown (without resolving its effect).
Upgrades.Name: Moff Jerjerrod

Upgrades.Description: After you execute a red manoeuvre, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship. Limited.
Upgrades.Name: Outlaw Tech

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the End phase, you may place 1 of your ship's focus tokens on this card. At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of those tokens to your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Rey

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^BOMB upgrade icon. Once per round, before a friendly bomb token is removed, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 of that token. That ship suffers 1 damage.
Upgrades.Name: Sabine Wren

Upgrades.Description: Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 and roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT or ^CRITICAL result, choose 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to that ship, flip it faceup, and resolve it.
Upgrades.Name: Saboteur

Upgrades.Description: After you execute a green maneuver, choose another friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may acquire a target lock.
Upgrades.Name: Systems Officer

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack against a ship inside your firing arc at Range 2, that ship receives 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Tactician

Upgrades.Description: When attacking from your rear-facing auxiliary firing arc, reduce the defender's agility by 1 (to a minimum of 0). Limited.
Upgrades.Name: Tail Gunner

Upgrades.Description: Action: Spend 1 energy to discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards, or spend 3 energy to discard 1 of your faceup Damage cards.
Upgrades.Name: WED15 Repair Droid

Upgrades.Description: Action: Spend 1 energy to discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards, or spend 3 energy to discard 1 of your faceup Damage cards.
Upgrades.Name: WED-15 Repair Droid

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack against a different ship. You cannot perform another attack this round.
Upgrades.Name: Baze Malbus

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, before you roll 1 or more defense dice, you may guess aloud a number of ^EVADE results. If you roll that many ^EVADE results (before modifying the dice), add 1 ^EVADE result.
Upgrades.Name: C3-PO

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to treat each friendly ship's pilot skill value as "12" until the end of the phase.
Upgrades.Name: Carlist Rieekan

Upgrades.Description: When you perform a recover action, you may spend 1 energy to discard 1 facedown Damage card.
Upgrades.Name: Construction Droid

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack against an enemy ship, you may suffer 2 damage to cause that ship to suffer 1 critical damage.
Upgrades.Name: Darth Vader

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die. If the defender is a unique pilot, you may instead reroll up to 2 attack dice.
Upgrades.Name: Dengar

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if you are stressed, you may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^CRITICAL result.
Upgrades.Name: Ezra Bridger

Upgrades.Description: Action: Choose up to 2 friendly ships at Range: 1-2 and assign 1 focus token to each of those ships. Then receive 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Fleet Officer

Upgrades.Description: After executing a green manoeuvre, you may acquire a target lock.
Upgrades.Name: K4 Security Droid

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, after a friendly ship at Range 1-2 executes a white manoeuvre, you may remove 1 stress token from that ship.
Upgrades.Name: Kanan Jarrus

Upgrades.Description: After you remove a stress token from your ship, you may assign a focus token to your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Kyle Katarn

Upgrades.Description: Action: Assign the "I'll Show You the Dark Side" Condition card to an enemy ship at Range 1-3.
Upgrades.Name: Kylo Ren

Upgrades.Description: Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each ^FOCUS result, assign 1 focus token to your ship. For each ^EVADE result, assign 1 evade token to your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Lando Calrissian

Upgrades.Description: At the end of the Combat phase, each enemy ship at Range 1 that does not have a stress token receives 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Mara Jade

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may receive any number of stress tokens to reroll that many attack dice. After performing an attack that hits, you may remove 1 of your stress tokens.
Upgrades.Name: Maul

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same bearing. You cannot rotate to a red maneuver if you have any stress tokens.
Upgrades.Name: Navigator

Upgrades.Description: After a friendly ship at Range 1-2 performs an attack that does not hit, you may assign 1 focus token to a friendly ship at Range 1-3 of the attacker.
Upgrades.Name: Operations Specialist

Upgrades.Description: Action: Execute a white ( ^Straight 1) maneuver.
Upgrades.Name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, the first ship that declares you as the target of an attack immediately receives 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Rebel Captive

Upgrades.Description: When you perform a focus action, assign 1 additional focus token to your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Recon Specialist

Upgrades.Description: You may maintain 2 target locks (only 1 per enemy ship). When you acquire a target lock, you may lock onto 2 enemy ships.
Upgrades.Name: Weapons Engineer

Upgrades.Description: When you are dealt a Damage card, you may immediately discard that card and recover 1 shield. Then, discard this Upgrade card.
Upgrades.Name: Chewbacca

Upgrades.Description: When defending, you may reroll one of your ^FOCUS results. If the attacker's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may reroll 1 of your blank results instead.
Upgrades.Name: Flight Instructor

Upgrades.Description: When attacking with a primary weapon, the defender must spend 1 focus token if able. When defending, the attacker must spend 1 focus token if able.
Upgrades.Name: Hotshot Co-pilot

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may discard this card to allow all friendly ships that reveal a red manoeuvre to treat that manoeuvre as a white manoeuvre until the end of the turn.
Upgrades.Name: Leia Organa

Upgrades.Description: At the end of the End phase, if you have no shields, you may recover 1 shield and roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT result, randomly flip one of your facedown Damage cards faceup and resolve it.
Upgrades.Name: R2-D2

Upgrades.Description: Energy: You may spend 1 energy to choose 1 friendly ship at Range: 1-2. Acquire a target lock, then assign the blue target lock token to the chosen ship.
Upgrades.Name: Targeting Coordinator

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, if you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to your ship, you may perform a free evade action.
Upgrades.Name: Ysanne Isard

Upgrades.Description: When attacking with a primary weapon or defending, if the enemy ship is inside your firing arc, you may add 1 blank result to your roll.
Upgrades.Name: Finn

Upgrades.Description: Action: Choose up to 3 friendly ships at Range 1-2. Assign 1 focus token to each of those ships and assign the "Fanatical Devotion" Condition card to 1 of them. Then receive 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: General Hux

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You cannot perform another attack this round.
Upgrades.Name: Gunner

Upgrades.Description: When you equip this card, place 1 illicit token on each ^Illicit Upgrade card in your squad. When you are instructed to discard an Upgrade card, you may discard 1 illicit token on that card instead.
Upgrades.Name: Jabba the Hutt

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose another ship at Range 14. Either remove 1 focus token from the chosen ship or assign 1 focus token to that ship.
Upgrades.Name: Grand Moff Tarkin

Upgrades.Description: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking, it may change 1 of its ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL.
Upgrades.Name: Jan Dodonna

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Activation Phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range: 1-3. You may look at that ship's chosen manoeuvre. If that manoeuvre is white, assign that ship 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Raymus Antilles

Upgrades.Description: Action: Spend any amount of energy to choose that many enemy ships at Range: 1-2. Remove all focus, evade, and blue target lock tokens from those ships.
Upgrades.Name: Toryn Farr

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You may change 1 ^FOCUS result to a ^HIT result. You cannot perform another attack this round.
Upgrades.Name: Luke Skywalker

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, you may change a friendly ship's die result to any other die result. That die cannot be modified again.
Upgrades.Name: Emperor Palpatine

Upgrades.Description: During setup, before the "Place Forces" step, select 1 enemy ship and assign the "A Debt ToPay" Condition card to it. When attacking a ship that has the "A Debt To Pay" Condition card, you may change 1 undefined result to a undefined result.
Upgrades.Name: A Score To Settle

Upgrades.Description: Dual Card. Either: Increase your pilot skill value by 1; or: Decrease your pilot skill value by 1.
Upgrades.Name: Adaptability (Decrease)

Upgrades.Description: Dual Card. Either: Increase your pilot skill value by 1; or: Decrease your pilot skill value by 1.
Upgrades.Name: Adaptability (Increase)

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if the attack is obstructed, you may roll 1 additional attack dice.
Upgrades.Name: Trick Shot

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal a red maneuver, you may discard this card to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the Activation phase.
Upgrades.Name: Adrenaline Rush

Upgrades.Description: Each time you are assigned a focus or stress token, each other friendly ship with Attanni Mindlink must also be assigned the same type of token if it does not already have one.
Upgrades.Name: Attanni Mindlink

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^HIT result.
Upgrades.Name: Calculation

Upgrades.Description: When you receive a stress token, you may discard this card to assign 1 ^FOCUS or ^EVADE token to your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Cool Hand

Upgrades.Description: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, you may discard this card to cancel 1 of the defender's ^EVADE results.
Upgrades.Name: Crack Shot

Upgrades.Description: You may treat the "Attack [Target Lock]" header as "Attack [Focus]". When an attack instructs you to spend a target lock, you may spend a focus token instead.
Upgrades.Name: Deadeye

Upgrades.Description: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card with the Pilot trait, discard it immediately without resolving its effect.
Upgrades.Name: Determination

Upgrades.Description: When a friendly ship at range 1 is hit by an attack, you may suffer 1 of the uncancelled  results instead of the target ship.
Upgrades.Name: Draw Their Fire

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if you are inside the defender's firing arc at Range 1 and the defender is inside your firing arc, you may add 1 ^HIT result to your roll.
Upgrades.Name: Fearlessness

Upgrades.Description: After you execute a white maneouvre on your dial, you may discard this card to rotate your ship 180°. Then receive 1 stress token after the “Check Pilot Stress” step.
Upgrades.Name: Lightning Reflexes

Upgrades.Description: Action: Assign 1 focus token to your ship and receive 2 stress tokens. Until the end of round, when attacking, you may reroll up to 3 dice.
Upgrades.Name: Rage

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack with a ^Torpedo or ^Missile secondary weapon that does not hit, each ship at Range 1 of the defender with an agility value lower than the squad point cost of the ^Torpedo or ^Missile Upgrade card must roll 1 attack die and suffer any damage (^Hit) or critical damage (^Critical) rolled.
Upgrades.Name: Saturation Salvo

Upgrades.Description: When a friendly ship at Range 1 is hit by an attack, you may discard this card to suffer all uncanceled ^Hit results instead of the target ship.
Upgrades.Name: Selflessness

Upgrades.Description: Increase your pilot skill value by 2.
Upgrades.Name: Veteran Instincts

Upgrades.Description: When attacking or defending, if you are stressed, you may reroll 1 or more of your ^FOCUS results.
Upgrades.Name: Wired

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend a focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1 with higher pilot skill than you. Increase its agility value by 1 until the end of the round.
Upgrades.Name: Bodyguard

Upgrades.Description: Action: Assign 1 evade token to your ship for each obstacle at Range 1, to a maximum of 2 evade tokens.
Upgrades.Name: Debris Gambit

Upgrades.Description: At the start of Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range: 1-2. Exchange your pilot skill with that ship's pilot skill until the end of the phase.
Upgrades.Name: Decoy

Upgrades.Description: When defending, you may receive 1 stress token to choose 1 attack die. The attacker must reroll that die. If you have at least 1 stress token, you cannot use this ability.
Upgrades.Name: Elusiveness

Upgrades.Description: Action: Perform a free barrel roll action. If you do not have the ^BARRELROLL action icon, receive 1 stress token. You may then remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Expert Handling

Upgrades.Description: After you perform a boost or barrel roll action, you may assign 1 focus or evade token to your ship. If you do, flip this card.
Upgrades.Name: Intensity

Upgrades.Description: At the end of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 focus or evade token to flip this card.
Upgrades.Name: Intensity (Exhausted)

Upgrades.Description: While you are touching an enemy ship, reduce that ship's agility value by 1.
Upgrades.Name: Intimidation

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if you have an evade token, you may change 1 of the defender's ^EVADE results into a ^FOCUS result.
Upgrades.Name: Juke

Upgrades.Description: When attacking or defending, if there are no friendly ships at Range: 1-2, you may reroll one of your blank results.
Upgrades.Name: Lone Wolf

Upgrades.Description: After an enemy ship executes a manoeuvre, you may perform this attack against that ship. Attack: Attack 1 ship. You cannot modify your attack dice and cannot attack again this phase. Attack value: 2. Range: 1.
Upgrades.Name: Snap Shot

Upgrades.Description: Action: Choose one ship at Range: 1-2 that has a lower pilot skill. The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free action.
Upgrades.Name: Squad Leader

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal a manoeuvre, you may rotate your dial to another manoeuvre with the same speed. Treat that manoeuvre as a red manoeuvre.
Upgrades.Name: Stay on Target

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the combat phase, choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1. Until the end of this phase, treat the chosen ship as if its pilot skill were equal to your pilot skill.
Upgrades.Name: Swarm Tactics

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from another friendly ship at Range 1.
Upgrades.Name: Wingman

Upgrades.Description: Action: Execute a white [ ^LEFTTURN 1] or [ ^RIGHTTURN 1] manouevre. Then, receive 1 stress token. Then, if you do not have the  action icon, roll 2 attack dice. Suffer any damage ^HIT or ^CRITICAL damage rolled.
Upgrades.Name: Daredevil

Upgrades.Description: Action: When attacking this round, you may change one of your ^FOCUS results to a ^CRITICAL result and all your other ^FOCUS results to ^HIT results.
Upgrades.Name: Marksmanship

Upgrades.Description: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, if you are not inside that ship's firing arc reduce its agility value by 1 (to a minumum of 0)
Upgrades.Name: Outmaneuver

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die. If the defender's pilot skill is "2" or lower, you may instead reroll up to 2 attack dice.
Upgrades.Name: Predator

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action shown in your action bar. Then receive 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Push the Limit

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack that hits, you must choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender (other than yourself). That ship suffers 1 Damage.
Upgrades.Name: Ruthlessness

Upgrades.Description: When performing a primary weapon attack, choose up to 2 other friendly ships that have the defender inside their firing arcs at Range 1-3. Remove 1 evade token from each chosen ship to roll 1 additional attack die for each token removed.
Upgrades.Name: Swarm Leader

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may change all of your ^FOCUS results to ^HIT results.
Upgrades.Name: Expertise

Upgrades.Description: Action: Until the end of the round, increase your primary weapon value by 1 and decrease your agility value by 1.
Upgrades.Name: Expose

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if the defender does not have any focus or evade tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die. You cannot use this ability if you have any stress tokens.
Upgrades.Name: Opportunist

Upgrades.Description: Attack (Energy): Spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside of your firing arc).
Upgrades.Name: Dual Laser Turret

Upgrades.Description: Attack (energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside of your firing arc).
Upgrades.Name: Heavy Laser Turret

Upgrades.Description: Attack (Energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 critical damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.
Upgrades.Name: Ion Cannon Battery

Upgrades.Description: Attack (Energy): Spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack.  If this attack does not hit, you may immediately spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack again.
Upgrades.Name: Quad Laser Cannons

Upgrades.Description: Attack (Energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack.  The defender doubles his agility value against this attack.  You may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^Hit result.
Upgrades.Name: Single Turbolasers

Upgrades.Description: Action: Choose a stressed enemy ship at Range 1-2 and roll 1 attack die. On a ^Hit or ^Critical result, remove 1 stress token and deal it 1 facedown Damage card.
Upgrades.Name: Black Market Slicer Tools

Upgrades.Description: Your action bar gains the [SLAM] action icon. After you perform a SLAM action, discard this card.
Upgrades.Name: Burnout SLAM

Upgrades.Description: When you become the active ship during the Activation phase, you may discard this card and receive 1 stress token. If you do, until the end of the round, you may perform actions and red maneuvers even while you are stressed.
Upgrades.Name: Contraband Cybernetics

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal your maneuver, you may discard this card to instead perform a white ([Stop] 0) maneuver. Then receive 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Inertial Dampeners

Upgrades.Description: Action: Discard this card to drop one cargo token.
Upgrades.Name: Rigged Cargo Chute

Upgrades.Description: Action: Perform a free cloak action. At the end of each round, roll 1 attack die. On a ^FOCUS result, discard this card, then decloak or discard your cloak token.
Upgrades.Name: Cloaking Device

Upgrades.Description: When you are destroyed, each ship at Range 1 suffers 1 damage.
Upgrades.Name: Dead Man's Switch

Upgrades.Description: During the Combat phase, instead of performing any attacks, you may discard this card to assign 2 ion tokens to each ship at Range 1.
Upgrades.Name: EMP Device

Upgrades.Description: During the Combat phase, instead of performing any attacks, you may receive 1 ion token and suffer 1 damage to choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1. That ship suffers 1 damage.
Upgrades.Name: Feedback Array

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card and receive 1 stress token. If you do, until the end of the round, when attacking or defending, you may change all of your ^FOCUS results to ^Hit or ^EVADE results.
Upgrades.Name: Glitterstim

Upgrades.Description: After you receive an ion token, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1. If you do, remove that ion token. Then that ship may choose to receive 1 ion token. If it does, discard this card.
Upgrades.Name: Ion Dischargers

Upgrades.Description: After a ship at Range 1-2 is destroyed, you may choose a discarded ^Torpedo, ^Missile, ^BOMB, ^Cannon, [Turret], or Modification Upgrade card that was equipped to your ship and flip it faceup. Then roll 1 attack die. On a blank result, discard Scavenger Crane.
Upgrades.Name: Scavenger Crane

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Discard this card to attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).
Upgrades.Name: "Hot Shot" Blaster

Upgrades.Description: This card has a negative squad point cost.
Upgrades.Name: Chardaan Refit

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Focus]: Discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, each friendly ship at Range: 1-2 of you may acquire a target lock on the defender. Then cancel all dice results. Attack value 3. Range: 1-3.
Upgrades.Name: XX-23 S-thread Tracers

Upgrades.Description: Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the defender and each other ship at Range 1 receive 1 jam token. Then cancel all results.
Upgrades.Name: Scrambler Missiles

Upgrades.Description: Attack (focus): Attack 1 ship. Your attack dice can be modified only by spending a focus token for its standard effect.
Upgrades.Name: Unguided Rockets

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target lock]: Discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, deal 1 faceup Damage card to the defender. Then cancel all dice results. Attack value 4. Range: 2-3.
Upgrades.Name: Advanced Homing Missiles

Upgrades.Description: Attack (Target Lock): Discard this card to perform this attack. You may roll additional attack dice equal to the speed of the maneuver you executed this round, to a maximum of 4 additional dice.
Upgrades.Name: Cruise Missiles

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Discard this card to perform this attack. If the attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 2 ion tokens. Then cancel all dice results. Attack: 3. Range: 2-3.
Upgrades.Name: Ion Pulse Missile

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Focus]: Discard this card to perform this attack. You may roll additional attack dice equal to your agility value, to a maximum of 3 additional dice. Attack value: 2. Range: 1.
Upgrades.Name: Proton Rockets

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your Target Lock and discard this card to perform this attack twice. Attack value: 3. Range: 1-2.
Upgrades.Name: Cluster Missiles

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your Target Lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may change 1 of your blank results to a ^HIT result. Attack value: 4. Range: 2-3.
Upgrades.Name: Concussion Missiles

Upgrades.Description: Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, after the attack resolves, assign the "Harpooned" Condition to the defender.
Upgrades.Name: Harpoon Missiles

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, each other ship at range 1 of the defender suffers 1 damage. Attack: 4. Range: 2-3.
Upgrades.Name: Assault Missiles

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Discard this card to perform this attack. The defender cannot spend evade tokens during this attack. Attack: 4. Range: 2-3.
Upgrades.Name: Homing Missiles

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, when attacking with a ^TORPEDO or ^MISSILE secondary weapon, you may change 1 die result to a ^HIT result (or a ^CRITICAL result if your primary weapon value is "3" or higher).
Upgrades.Name: Guidance Chips

Upgrades.Description: When you are dealt a Damage card, you may discard 1 of your ^Astromech Upgrade cards to discard that Damage card (without resolving its effect).
Upgrades.Name: Integrated Astromech

Upgrades.Description: You can acquire target locks on ships at Range 3 and beyond. You cannot acquire target locks on ships at Range 1-2. You can equip this card only if you have ^TORPEDO and ^MISSILE in your upgrade bar.
Upgrades.Name: Long Range Scanners

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^Illicit upgrade icon. You may equip 1 additional Modification upgrade that costs 3 or fewer squad points.
Upgrades.Name: Smuggling Compartment

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^CREW icon.
Upgrades.Name: B-Wing/E2

Upgrades.Description: Enemy ships with a pilot skill value lower than yours cannot declare you as the target of an attack. After you perform an attack or when you are the only remaining friendly ship in play, discard this card.
Upgrades.Name: Captured TIE

Upgrades.Description: When a friendly bomb token detonates, you may choose not to suffer its effects. If you do, roll an attack die. on a ^Hit result, discard this card.
Upgrades.Name: Deflective Plating

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal a turn maneuver ( ^LEFTTURN or ^RIGHTTURN ), you may rotate your dial to the corresponding bank maneuver ( ^LEFTBANK or ^RIGHTBANK ) of the same speed.
Upgrades.Name: Maneuvering Fins

Upgrades.Description: When attacking with a secondary weapon that instructs you to discard it to perform the attack, do not discard it unless the attack hits.
Upgrades.Name: Munitions Failsafe

Upgrades.Description: Your ship can obstruct enemy attacks.
Upgrades.Name: Tactical Jammer

Upgrades.Description: You may treat all bank manoeuvres ( ^LEFTBANK or ^RIGHTBANK ) as green manoeuvres.
Upgrades.Name: Twin Ion Engine Mk. II

Upgrades.Description: After performing a ^SLAM action, if you did not overlap an obstacle or another ship, you may perform a free action.
Upgrades.Name: Advanced SLAM

Upgrades.Description: After an enemy ship performs a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT or ^CRITICAL result, the enemy ship suffers 1 damage.
Upgrades.Name: Anti-Pursuit Lasers

Upgrades.Description: When defending, if you are beyond Range 2 or outside the attacker's firing arc, you may change 1 of your blank results to a ^EVADE result. You can equip this card only if you have the ^BOOST icon.
Upgrades.Name: Autothrusters

Upgrades.Description: At the end of the Combat phase, if you executed a 3-, 4-, or 5-speed maneuver that round, you may rotate your mobile firing arc.
Upgrades.Name: Gyroscopic Targeting

Upgrades.Description: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT or ^CRITICAL result, the enemy ship receives 1 ion token.
Upgrades.Name: Ion projector

Upgrades.Description: When defending, after rolling defense dice, if there are more attack dice than defense dice, roll 1 additional defense die. You cannot equip this card if your agility value is "3" or higher.
Upgrades.Name: Lightweight Frame

Upgrades.Description: During the End phase, you may receive 1 ion token to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value). You can equip this card only if your shield value is "1".
Upgrades.Name: Pulsed Ray Shield

Upgrades.Description: Action: Choose a ship inside your firing arc at Range 1 and assign a tractor beam token to it. If it is a friendly ship, resolve the effect of the tractor beam token a though it were an enemy ship.
Upgrades.Name: Spacetug Tractor Array

Upgrades.Description: When you either decloak or perform a cloak action, you may perform a free evade action.
Upgrades.Name: Stygium Particle Accelerator

Upgrades.Description: Your action bar gains the ^TARGETLOCK icon.
Upgrades.Name: Targeting Computer

Upgrades.Description: Your action bar gains the ^BARRELROLL icon.
Upgrades.Name: Vectored Thrusters

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card to increase your agility value by 1 for the rest of the round. Then you may remove 1 enemy target lock token from your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Counter Measures

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card to increase your agility value by 1 until the end of the round. Then you may remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Countermeasures

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action from an equipped Upgrade card with the "Action:" header. Then receive 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Experimental Interface

Upgrades.Description: Increase your hull value by 1
Upgrades.Name: Hull Upgrade

Upgrades.Description: Increase your agility value by 1. If you are hit by an attack, discard this card.
Upgrades.Name: Stealth Device

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free cloak action.
Upgrades.Name: Advanced Cloaking Device

Upgrades.Description: Your action bar gains the ^BOOST action icon.
Upgrades.Name: Engine Upgrade

Upgrades.Description: Increase your shield value by 1.
Upgrades.Name: Shield Upgrade

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, after you perform an action that is not a recover or reinforce action, you may spend 1 energy to perform a free recover or reinforce action.
Upgrades.Name: Automated Protocols

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, when you assign energy to an equipped Upgrade card, gain 2 energy.
Upgrades.Name: Optimized Generators

Upgrades.Description: You may treat each of your [Hardpoint] upgrade icons as a ^Torpedo or ^Missile upgrade icon. When you are instructed to discard a ^Torpedo or ^Missile Upgrade card, do not discard it.
Upgrades.Name: Ordnance Tubes

Upgrades.Description: Increase your hull value by 2 and your shield value by 1.
Upgrades.Name: Combat Retrofit

Upgrades.Description: After you reveal and execute a maneuver, if you did not overlap a ship, you may discard 1 of your equipped ^BOMB Upgrade cards without the "Action:" header to drop the corresponding bomb token.
Upgrades.Name: "Genius"

Upgrades.Description: You can acquire target locks on friendly ships. You can attack friendly ships.
Upgrades.Name: R5-TK

Upgrades.Description: During the Combat phase, when you spend a focus token, you may receive 1 stress token to assign 1 focus token to your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Overclocked R4

Upgrades.Description: You can perform actions on your ^Torpedo and ^BOMB Upgrade cards even if you are stressed. After you perform an action in this way, you may discard this card to remove 1 stress token from your ship.
Upgrades.Name: R4-E1

Upgrades.Description: You may treat all 3-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.
Upgrades.Name: Unhinged Astromech

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, after you spend a focus token, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.
Upgrades.Name: R4 Agromech

Upgrades.Description: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card with the Ship trait, you may immediately discard that card (before resolving its effect). Then, discard this Upgrade card.
Upgrades.Name: Salvaged Astromech

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all defense dice. The defender must reroll the chosen dice.
Upgrades.Name: R4-B11

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, after defending, you may roll 1 attack die. On a ^Hit result, the attacker suffers 1 damage. On a ^Critical result, you and the attacker each suffer 1 damage.
Upgrades.Name: R5-P8

Upgrades.Description: When performing a boost, barrel roll, or decloak, your ship and maneuver template can overlap obstacles. When rolling for obstacle damage, ignore all ^Critical results.
Upgrades.Name: Collision Detector

Upgrades.Description: During setup, after the "Place Forces" step, you may discard any number of your equipped ^BOMB Upgrade cards. Place all corresponding bomb tokens in the play area beyond Range 3 of enemy ships.
Upgrades.Name: Minefield Mapper

Upgrades.Description: When you receive a stress token or an ion token, you may suffer 1 damage to discard that token.
Upgrades.Name: Electronic Baffle

Upgrades.Description: During the Activation phase, treat your pilot skill as "0".
Upgrades.Name: Enhanced Scopes

Upgrades.Description: You may launch bombs using the ([Straight] 5) template instead of dropping them. You cannot launch bombs with the "Action:" header in this way.
Upgrades.Name: Trajectory Simulator

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.
Upgrades.Name: Fire-Control System

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, you may cancel all of your dice results. Then you may add 2 ^HIT results to your roll. Your dice cannot be modified again this attack.
Upgrades.Name: Accuracy Corrector

Upgrades.Description: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform 1 free action. If you use this ability, skip your "Perform Action" step during this round.
Upgrades.Name: Advanced Sensors

Upgrades.Description: After defending, if you suffered a combination of 3 or more damage and critical damage during the attack, recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).
Upgrades.Name: Reinforced Deflectors

Upgrades.Description: When defending, you may change 1 of the attacker's ^HIT results to a ^FOCUS result. The attacker cannot reroll the die with the changed result.
Upgrades.Name: Sensor Jammer

Upgrades.Description: When attacking with your primary weapon, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may add 1 ^CRITICAL result to your roll. If you do, you cannot spend target locks during this attack.
Upgrades.Name: Advanced Targeting Computer

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, you may change 1 of your ^Hit results to a ^Critical result.
Upgrades.Name: IG-RM Thug Droids

Upgrades.Description: During the Activation phase, when you reveal a [Straight] maneuver, gain 1 additional energy during the "Gain Energy" step.
Upgrades.Name: Engineering Team

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, when attacking with a secondary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to change 1 of your blank results to a ^Hit result.
Upgrades.Name: Gunnery Team

Upgrades.Description: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-5 (instead of Range 1-3).
Upgrades.Name: Sensor Team

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-3 performs an attack with a ^Torpedo or ^Missile secondary weapon, it may change 1 of its blank results to a ^Hit result.
Upgrades.Name: Ordnance Experts

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the "Place Forces" step, you may choose to treat your pilot skill value as "0", "6" or "12", until the end of the step. During setup, after another friendly ship is placed at Range 1-2, you may assign 1 focus or evade token to it.
Upgrades.Name: Hyperwave Comm Scanner

Upgrades.Description: Stress tokens do not prevent you from performing boost or barrel roll actions unless you have 3 or more stress tokens.
Upgrades.Name: Primed Thrusters

Upgrades.Description: You cannot have more than 1 focus token. During the End phase, do not remove an unused focus token from your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Advanced Optics

Upgrades.Description: When executing a manoeuvre, you may resolve the "Check Pilot Stress" step after the "Perform Action" step (instead of before that step).
Upgrades.Name: Pattern Analyzer

Upgrades.Description: When defending, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your blank results to an ^EVADE result.
Upgrades.Name: Sensor Cluster

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a ^HIT result.
Upgrades.Name: Weapons Guidance

Upgrades.Description: You cannot have more that 1 evade token. During the End phase, do not remove an unused evade token from your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Comm Relay

Upgrades.Description: When a friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking a ship you have locked, the friendly ship treats the "Attack [targetlock]" :header as "Attack:" If a game effect instructs that ship to spend a target lock, it may spend your target lock instead.
Upgrades.Name: Targeting Synchronizer

Upgrades.Description: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-2 becomes the active ship during the Combat phase, you may spend your target lock on that ship to perform a free boost or barrel roll action if that action is on your action bar.
Upgrades.Name: Threat Tracker

Upgrades.Description: You may equip up to 2 different Title upgrades. When performing a barrel roll action, you must use the ([Bank Left] 1) or ([Bank Right] 1) template instead of the ([Straight] 1) template.
Upgrades.Name: StarViper Mk. II

Upgrades.Description: All Damage cards dealt to you are dealt faceup. You may treat all bank maneuvers ( ^LEFTBANK or ^RIGHTBANK ) as green maneuvers. You cannot equip Modification upgrades.
Upgrades.Name: "Light Scyk" Interceptor

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar loses the ^CANNON and ^MISSILE upgrade icons. After executing a 3, 4 or 5 speed maneuver, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.
Upgrades.Name: TIE/x7

Upgrades.Description: Immediately before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white ( ^LEFTBANK 1), ( ^STRAIGHT 1), or ( ^RIGHTBANK 1) maneuver.
Upgrades.Name: Adaptive Ailerons

Upgrades.Description: When attacking with a primary weapon from your primary firing arc, you may roll 1 additional attack die. When attacking from your auxiliary firing arc, you may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^Critical result.
Upgrades.Name: Alliance Overhaul

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains two additional ^BOMB upgrade icons.
Upgrades.Name: Andrasta

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains 1 ^ELITEPILOTTALENT upgrade icon. You cannot equip 2 of the same ^ELITEPILOTTALENT upgrade cards. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "1" or lower.
Upgrades.Name: A-Wing Test Pilot

Upgrades.Description: You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a ^TURRET secondary weapon.
Upgrades.Name: BTLA4 Y-Wing

Upgrades.Description: Equip the Phantom title card to a friendly Attack Shuttle and dock it to this ship. After you execute a maneuver, you may deploy it from your rear guides.
Upgrades.Name: Ghost

Upgrades.Description: Equip the Phantom II title card to a friendly Sheathipede-class shuttle and dock it to this ship. After you execute a maneuver, you may deploy it from your rear guides.
Upgrades.Name: Ghost

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^SystemUpgrade and ^SalvagedAstromech upgrade icons and loses the ^Crew upgrade icon. You cannot equip non-unique ^SalvagedAstromech Upgrade cards.
Upgrades.Name: Havoc

Upgrades.Description: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).
Upgrades.Name: IG2000

Upgrades.Description: Your action bar gains the ^BARRELROLL action icon. You must equip 1 "Tractor Beam" upgrade (paying the squad point cost as normal).
Upgrades.Name: Mist Hunter

Upgrades.Description: While you are docked, the Ghost can perform primary weapon attacks from its special firing arc and, at the end of the Combat phase, it may perform an additional attack with an equipped [Turret]. If it performs this attack, it cannot attack again this round.
Upgrades.Name: Phantom

Upgrades.Description: While you are docked, the Ghost can perform primary weapon attacks from its special firing arc. While you are docked, at the end of the Activation phase, the Ghost may perform a free coordinate action.
Upgrades.Name: Phantom II

Upgrades.Description: Increase your agility value by 1. After you execute a maneuver, you may flip this card.
Upgrades.Name: Pivot Wing (Attack)

Upgrades.Description: When you reveal a (0 ^Stop ) maneuver, you may rotate your ship 180 degrees;. After you execute a maneuver, you may flip this card.
Upgrades.Name: Pivot Wing (Landing)

Upgrades.Description: You may equip up to 2 different ^MODIFICATION upgrades (instead of 1). You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "4" or lower.
Upgrades.Name: Royal Guard TIE

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^TORPEDO icon.
Upgrades.Name: Slave-1

Upgrades.Description: When attacking with a primary weapon from your primary firing arc, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do not, you may perform an additional attack from your auxiliary firing arc.
Upgrades.Name: Special Ops Training

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, after you perform an attack with a Cannon secondary weapon that costs 3 or fewer squad points, you may perform a primary weapon attack.
Upgrades.Name: TIE/D

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar loses all ^MISSILE , ^TORPEDO and ^BOMB upgrade icons and gains 2 ^CREW upgrade icons. You cannot equip an upgrade card that costs more than 4 squad points.
Upgrades.Name: TIE/Shuttle

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^SYSTEMUPGRADE upgrade icon. If you equip a ^SYSTEMUPGRADE upgrade, its squad point cost is reduced by 4 (to a minimum of 0).
Upgrades.Name: TIE/x1

Upgrades.Description: The squad point cost of each of your equipped upgrades is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0). You may equip up to 3 different Modification upgrades.
Upgrades.Name: Vaksai

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^CANNON, ^TORPEDO, or ^MISSILE upgrade icon.
Upgrades.Name: “Heavy Scyk” Interceptor (Cannon)

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^CANNON, ^TORPEDO, or ^MISSILE upgrade icon.
Upgrades.Name: “Heavy Scyk” Interceptor (Missile)

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^CANNON, ^TORPEDO, or ^MISSILE upgrade icon.
Upgrades.Name: “Heavy Scyk” Interceptor (Torpedo)

Upgrades.Description: After you perform a boost or barrel roll action, you may remove 1 enemy target lock from a friendly ship at Range 1. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "6" or lower.
Upgrades.Name: Black One

Upgrades.Description: When defending, if you are inside the attacker's firing arc and at Range 1 and the attacker is inside your firing arc, add 1 ^EVADE result.
Upgrades.Name: Concord Dawn Protector

Upgrades.Description: After defending, if the attacker is inside your bullseye firing arc, it receives 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Enforcer

Upgrades.Description: After your perform the recover action, gain 3 energy.
Upgrades.Name: Insatiable Worrt

Upgrades.Description: Your action bar gains the ^EVADE action icon.
Upgrades.Name: Millennium Falcon

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^Crew and ^Illicit upgrade icons.
Upgrades.Name: Sabine's Masterpiece

Upgrades.Description: After you acquire a target lock, you may perform a free ^EVADE action.
Upgrades.Name: TIE/v1

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^SYSTEMUPGRADE and ^ILLICIT upgrade icons. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "3" or lower.
Upgrades.Name: Virago

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains 2 ^Cannon upgrade icons. You may perform attacks with ^Cannon secondary weapons that cost 2 or fewer squad points even while you have a weapons disabled token.
Upgrades.Name: Xg-1 Assault Configuration

Upgrades.Description: When defending, if the targeted section has a reinforce token, you may change 1 ^FOCUS result to a ^EVADE result.
Upgrades.Name: Assailer

Upgrades.Description: When defending, if there is at least 1 other friendly Resistance ship at Range 1-2 of the attacker, you may add one ^FOCUS result to your roll.
Upgrades.Name: Crossfire Formation

Upgrades.Description: After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform 1 free action. Then receive 1 stress token.
Upgrades.Name: Dauntless

Upgrades.Description: When performing a jam action, you may choose an enemy ship at range 1 (instead of at Range 2).
Upgrades.Name: Dutyfree

Upgrades.Description: When attacking, if the defender is the only ship in your firing arc at Range 1-3, you may reroll 1 attack die. When defending, you may discard this card to reroll all of your defense dice.
Upgrades.Name: First Order Vanguard

Upgrades.Description: When defending, once per attack, if you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard it and draw another faceup Damage card.
Upgrades.Name: Jaina's Light

Upgrades.Description: At the end of the Combat phase, choose an unstressed enemy ship at Range 1-2. The owner must assign a stress token to it or assign a stress token to another ship at Range 1-2 of you that that player controls.
Upgrades.Name: Kylo Ren's Shuttle

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains 1 additional ^Crew upgrade icon and 1 additional [Team] upgrade icon and loses 1 [Cargo] upgrade icon.
Upgrades.Name: Merchant One

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^Torpedo and ^Missile upgrade icons. You may perform attacks with ^Torpedo and ^Missile secondary weapons against ships you have locked even while you have a weapons disabled token.
Upgrades.Name: Os-1 Arsenal Loadout

Upgrades.Description: After you execute a maneuver, you may deploy up to 4 docked ships (instead of 2).
Upgrades.Name: Vector

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack that destroys an enemy ship, you may acquire a target lock.
Upgrades.Name: Impetuous

Upgrades.Description: During the End phase, do not remove unused focus tokens from your ship.
Upgrades.Name: Moldy Crow

Upgrades.Description: After you perform an attack that hits, if the defender is inside your mobile firing arc and at Range 1-2, you may assign the defender 1 tractor beam token.
Upgrades.Name: Shadow Caster

Upgrades.Description: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto any target in the play area.
Upgrades.Name: ST-321

Upgrades.Description: When you perform a coordinate action, you may choose 2 friendly ships (instead of 1). Those ships may each perform 1 free action.
Upgrades.Name: Dodonna's Pride

Upgrades.Description: After you perform a recover action, recover 1 additional shield.
Upgrades.Name: Instigator

Upgrades.Description: At the start of the End phase, if you have 1 or fewer energy tokens, gain 1 energy token.
Upgrades.Name: Quantum Storm

Upgrades.Description: When you deploy a ship, treat its pilot skill value as "8" until the end of the round.
Upgrades.Name: Requiem

Upgrades.Description: A reinforce token assigned to your fore section adds 2 ^EVADE results (instead of 1).
Upgrades.Name: Bright Hope

Upgrades.Description: When defending, if you have a reinforce token, you may add 1 additional ^EVADE result. If you do, after defending, discard your reinforce token.
Upgrades.Name: Broken Horn

Upgrades.Description: When you have a ^CANNON Upgrade card equipped, you cannot perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform Cannon secondary weapon attacks against ships outside your firing arc.
Upgrades.Name: Outrider

Upgrades.Description: Your fore section upgrade bar gains 1 additional ^CREW and 1 additional ^TEAM upgrade icon.
Upgrades.Name: Tantive IV

Upgrades.Description: After you are destroyed, before you are removed from the play area, you may deploy the Nastah Pup Pilot. It cannot attack this round.
Upgrades.Name: Hound's Tooth

Upgrades.Description: Once per round, after you acquire a target lock on an enemy ship, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from that ship.
Upgrades.Name: Suppressor

Upgrades.Description: Increase your primary weapon value by 1.
Upgrades.Name: Punishing One

Upgrades.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^BOMB icon. Limited.
Upgrades.Name: Bomb Loadout

Upgrades.Description: When you equip this card, place 1 ordnance token on each equipped ^TORPEDO, ^MISSILE, and ^BOMB Upgrade card. When you are instructed to discard an Upgrade card, you may discard 1 ordnance token on that card instead. Limited.
Upgrades.Name: Extra Munitions

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend you target lock an discard this card to perform this attack. After you perform this attack, the defender receives 1 stress token if its hull value is "4" or less. Attack value: 3. Range: 2-3.
Upgrades.Name: Flechette Torpedoes

Upgrades.Description: Action: Discard this card to choose an obstacle at Range 1-2 and inside your primary firing arc. Each ship at Range 1 of the obstacle rolls 1 attack die and suffers any damage (^Hit) and critical damage (^Critical) rolled. Then remove the obstacle.
Upgrades.Name: Seismic Torpedo

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, after dealing damage, remove 1 shield token from the defender.
Upgrades.Name: Plasma Torpedoes

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may change one of your ^FOCUS results to a ^CRITICAL result. Attack value: 4. Range: 2-3.
Upgrades.Name: Proton Torpedoes

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If the attack hits, the defender and each ship at Range 1 of it receives 1 ion token. Attack value: 4. Range: 2-3.
Upgrades.Name: Ion Torpedoes

Upgrades.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to attack. You may change up to 3 of your blank results to ^FOCUS results. Attack value: 5. Range: 1.
Upgrades.Name: Advanced Proton Torpedoes

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). Your ^Hit results cannot be canceled by defense dice. The defender may cancel ^Critical results before ^Hit results.
Upgrades.Name: Autoblaster Turret

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). If the target of this attack is at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.
Upgrades.Name: Dorsal Turret

Upgrades.Description: Attack (focus): Spend 1 focus token to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).
Upgrades.Name: Blaster Turret

Upgrades.Description: Attack (target lock): Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). If the defender is inside your primary firing arc, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to your primary weapon value.
Upgrades.Name: Synced Turret

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). If this attack hits the target ship, the ship suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token.  Then cancel all dice results.
Upgrades.Name: Ion Cannon Turret

Upgrades.Description: Attack: Perform this attack twice (even against a ship outside your firing arc). Each time this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage. Then cancel all dice results.
Upgrades.Name: Twin Laser Turret
